alert.note: Alert for Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 1:54AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Sussex, Kent, northeastern Talbot, eastern Queen Anne`s and Caroline Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 154 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sudlersville to near Easton. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover, Easton, Denton, Harrington, Camden, Federalsburg, Greensboro, Oakland, Ridgely, Cheswold, Preston, Sudlersville, Goldsboro, Queen Anne, Woodside, Viola, Hartly, Smithville, Starr and Hazlettville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
